definition[0]: the activity of writing programs for computers, or something written by a programmer
definition[1]: television or radio programmes, or the planning of these broadcasts
example[1]: The Winter Olympics received over 160 hours of television programming.
definition[2]: the work of writing instructions for computers to perform particular tasks
definition[3]: television or radio programmes, or the work involved in producing them
example[3]: The network will broadcast eight hours of programming a day.
example[4]: He plans to move into programming.
